类 Shoe

java.lang.Object
Shoe
public class Shoe extends Object
The Shoe class represents a shoe with specific kind, color, brand, and size. It uses enums for kind, color, and brand, and validates that Nike does not produce Dress shoes.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Shoe(Kind kind, Brand brand, Color color, double size)
    Constructs a Shoe object with the given kind, color, brand, and size.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Shoe

      public Shoe(Kind kind, Brand brand, Color color, double size)
      Constructs a Shoe object with the given kind, color, brand, and size. Throws IllegalArgumentException if brand is NIKE and kind is DRESS.
      参数:
      kind - The type of the shoe (e.g., SNEAKER, DRESS)
      brand - The brand of the shoe (e.g., NIKE, ADIDAS)
      color - The color of the shoe (e.g., RED, WHITE)
      size - The size of the shoe (double)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if brand is NIKE and kind is DRESS

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the shoe, summarizing all attributes. Uses switch statements for custom capitalization and provides default names for some colors.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      a formatted string with shoe details
